resources.string:
This app is a fast service to all the coders out there. It identifies properties of a number ,although constricting itself to the scope of the algorithm and the system. 
 
 Company Name : Mathastic 
 
 Works on all android versions greater than API level 16 
 
 More functoning code will be added soon for more ease in programming

Please allow storage permission for the functioning of app 
 Go to Settings -> Installed apps -> Permissions -> Storage -> Mathly 
 
 History 
 history accommodates the processes one has worked out since the last deletion of the same. Yes there is a history deletion option. 
 
 GCD 
 It calculates the greatest common divisor of two numbers, however being in the scope of the algorithm and the device. 
 
 Factors 
 It can work out factors and prime factorisation of a number. 
 
 Prime 
 Gives you the Prime numbers between two numbers, provided former is less than latter. 
 
 ModularExpo 
 It can calculate the remainder of a number raised to the power of another number when divided by another number, however being in the scope of algorithm and the device. 
 
 Modularmultinver 
 Modularmultinver(as we have named it) or a modular multiplicative inverse of an integer a is an integer x such that the product ax is congruent to 1 with respect to the modulus m. 
 
 BigFactorial 
 Calculates the factorial of a number. 
 
 nCr 
 Calculates combinatorial where r is less than equal to n. 
 
 CheckFibonacci 
 Checks whether a number is in the fibonacci series. 
 
 Calculator 
 Takes you to the calculator of the device.
